message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Can you meet me halfway?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go as low as $80. How about we meet in the middle at $85? It's a fair price considering the product's value.
I'm still not comfortable with the price at $85. I'd be willing to go up to $82, but that's my final offer. Can you meet me there?
I'm not willing to give up on this deal yet! I can do $84, but that's my final offer. It's still a great price considering the product's value, and I think it's worth it.
I'm getting close, but I'm still not comfortable with the price at $84. I'd be willing to go up to $81, but that's my final offer. Can you meet me there?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $83. I think it's a fair price considering the product's value, and I'm willing to compromise. Can you meet me at $83?
I'm really close to walking away, but I'll make one more offer. I'll meet you at $82. That's my absolute limit. Can you accept?
